member.name: ID2D1CommandSink4.SetPrimitiveBlend2
member.summary: Sets a new primitive blend mode. Allows access to the MAX primitive blend mode.
member.param: The primitive blend that will apply to subsequent primitives.
member.returns: If the method succeeds, it returns S_OK. If it fails, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1CommandSink4
member.summary: This interface performs all the same functions as the existing interface. It also enables access to the new primitive blend mode, MAX, through the method.
